price: Sema: Hakika Mola wangu Mlezi anaondoa upotovu kwa Haki. Yeye ndiye Mwenye kujua vyema yaliyo ghaibu.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
footnotes: Waambie: Hakika Mola wangu Mlezi huitupa Haki juu ya baat'ili (uwongo) ikauondoa. Na Yeye ndiye Mwenye kuijua vyema ghaibu; hapana siri inayo fichikana kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
